title: As a User I need to Fill Username & Password field.

stories.heading: User can fill Username field
stories.description: As a User, I want to fill the Username field so that I can log in with my username.
acceptance_criteria: Username field is present on the webpage

stories.heading: User can fill Password field
stories.description: As a User, I want to fill the Password field so that I can securely log in with my password.
acceptance_criteria: Password field is present on the webpage

stories.heading: Prevent user from clicking Login Button without validation
stories.description: As a User, I want to be unable to click the Login Button unless my Username and Password pass validation.
acceptance_criteria: Login Button is disabled by default
Login Button becomes enabled only when both Username and Password pass validation

stories.heading: User receives message after successful login
stories.description: As a User, I want to receive a message after successfully logging in to confirm my login status.
acceptance_criteria: Message is displayed on the webpage after successful login

stories.heading: User can clear Username & Password fields using Cancel Button
stories.description: As a User, I want to clear the Username & Password fields by clicking the Cancel Button.
acceptance_criteria: Cancel Button is present on the webpage
Clicking Cancel Button clears both Username and Password fields
